summary: Completed frontend testing of redesigned secondary sidebar with brand blue navigation. All 6 requested features working correctly: blue header matching top nav, light blue gradient background, navigation between Parties submodules, module switcher functionality, active state highlighting on both sidebars, and primary sidebar hover expand.

console_warnings.issue: React warning: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop
React warning: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop

secondary_sidebar_blue_header.description: Secondary sidebar header has blue gradient (from-[#3A4E63] to-[#0449B8]) matching top navigation bar

secondary_sidebar_light_blue_gradient.description: Secondary sidebar body has light blue gradient background (from-[#f0f4ff] to-[#e8eeff])
sections: SWITCH MODULE section at bottom with module buttons

elements_visible_when_expanded: Innovate Books logo and 'Enterprise Suite' text
User profile with name and role

critical_code_review_comments: VendorsList.jsx and LeadListFinal.jsx have React key prop warnings - should add unique key to list items (minor, carried over from previous iterations)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Secondary sidebar redesign complete with brand blue navigation. Features verified: blue header matching top nav, light blue gradient body (#f0f4ff to #e8eeff), NAVIGATION section with submodule links, SWITCH MODULE section at bottom, active state highlighting on both sidebars, primary sidebar hover expand. Minor console warnings in VendorsList and LeadListFinal for React key prop. All navigation and module switching works correctly.
